ReportSection.name: FOCUS Delphi Study
ReportSection.title: FOCUS Delphi Study
ReportSection.Static: Thank you for your participation in the FOCUS Delphi Study. Following three rounds of voting with an aim to reach consensus on a core set of data elements and outcomes, the following data elements and outcomes met consensus criteria across all three stakeholder groups. In order to narrow the core set further to a number of data elements and outcomes which one could reasonably expect to be measured in research studies, we are asking you to identify your top 2 data elements and outcomes within each category. Within each category, the data element or outcome which ranks highest will form part of the core set to be measured, while the data element or outcome which ranks second highest will form part of an additional ‘optional’ set.

ReportSection.ReportItem: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type="text/javascript">
                    $("#optionsDiv").hide();
                
                    $("#reportBody input[type=radio]").click(function(e){
                        var name = $(this).attr('name');
                        var value = $(this).attr('value');
                        var otherName = "";
                        if(name.indexOf("_1") != -1){
                            otherName = name.replace("_1", "_2");
                        }
                        else{
                            otherName = name.replace("_2", "_1");
                        }
                        var other = $("#reportBody input[type=radio][name=" + otherName + "]:checked");
                        var otherValue = $(other).attr('value');
                        if(value == otherValue){
                            $(other).prop('checked', false);
                        }
                    });
                    
                    $("#reportBody input[type=radio]").change(function(e){
                        if($('#reportBody input[type=radio]:checked').length == 22){
                            $('#reportFooter button[type=submit]').prop('disabled', false);
                            $('#reportFooter input#submit').prop('disabled', false);
                        }
                        else{
                            $('#reportFooter button[type=submit]').prop('disabled', true);
                            $('#reportFooter input#submit').prop('disabled', true);
                        }
                    });
                    $(document).ready(function(){
                        $("#reportFooter button").after("<input id='submit' type='button' value='Submit' />");
                        var callBack = function(){
                            alert('Thank you for submitting the FOCUS Survey');
                        }
                        
                        $("#submit").click(function(e){
                            saveAll(callBack);
                        });
                        
                        $("#reportBody input[type=radio]").change();
                    });
                </script>
